bioconda.name: bioconductor-annaffy
bioconda.summary: Annotation tools for Affymetrix biological metadata

biotools.summary: Functions for handling data from BioConductor Affymetrix annotation data packages. Produces compact HTML and text reports including experimental data and URL links to many online databases. Allows searching biological metadata using various criteria.

bioschemas.name: annaffy
bioschemas.summary: Functions for handling data from BioConductor Affymetrix annotation data packages. Produces compact HTML and text reports including experimental data and URL links to many online databases. Allows searching biological metadata using various criteria.
